title: ISic001370. Epitaph for Tychemos
body:
1Ἐτελεύτησεν
2Τύχημος τῇ
3πρ(ὸ) δεκαπέντε´ κα-
4λανδῶν Ἰενουαρί-
5ων ζήσας ἒτη π´
6καλὸν βίον ζήσας
7ἠγόρασεν ἑαυτῷ καὶ
8τοῖς ἠδίοις ☧
9 #cross

1ΕΤΕΛΕΥΤΗΣΕΝ
2ΤΥΧΗΜΟΣΤΗ
3ΠΡΔΕΚΑΠΕΝΤΕΚΑ
4ΛΑΝΔΩΝΙΕΝΟΥΑΡΙ
5ΩΝΖΗΣΑΣΕΤΗΠ
6ΚΑΛΟΝΒΙΟΝΖΗΣΑΣ
7ΗΓΟΡΑΣΕΝΕΑΥΤΩΚΑΙ
8ΤΟΙΣΗΔΙΟΙΣ☧
9(cross)

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based on photograph;
  • line.2: lapis: Τύχημος (i.e. Τύχιμος); Ferrua: Εὐτυχήμος (i.e. Εὐθυδήμος); Amico: Τύχηλλος
  • line.4: Kirchhoff: Ἰ[α]νυαρίων; Kaibel, Wessel, Korhonen: Ἰενυαρίων
  • lines.8-9: Wessel and Korhonen read two Christograms

English translation

Tychemos died 15 days before the Kalends of January, having lived 80 years. Having lived a good life, he purchased this (tomb) for him and his relatives.

Italian translation

Marta Fogagnolo

Tychemos è morto 15 giorni prima delle Calende di gennaio, avendo vissuto 80 anni. Avendo vissuto una bella vita, acquistò questo (sepolcro) per lui e i suoi.

commentary

This Christian epitaph does not present the ἐνθάδε κεῖται formula, but directly the date of death expressed by the aorist of τελευτάω and the age of the deceased with the participle ζήσας. This is followed by the indication of the purchase of the tomb (with the aorist of ἀγοράζω) by the deceased, for him and his descendants (ἠδίοις is an hypercorrection): for the reference to the descendants in pagan and Christian epitaphs in Catania, see IG 14.563 = ISic001382, SEG XVII 440 = ISic001628. On καλὸν βίον ζήσας/βιώσας, see also IGUR 2.626. The name of the deceased, Τύχημος (probably Τύχιμος), is not otherwise attested; Ferrua’s reading is palaeographically improbable (furthermore, Εὐτύχημος is not attested in imperial age, see BCH 45 (1921) p. 19 III, 101 from Kythera, 3rd cent. BCE), as well as Leclercq’s reading Τύχηλλος.

Note that the text has been badly overpainted in early modern times, leading to several misleading letter forms (e.g. initial epsilon as sigma)

bibliography

  • 853 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000394
  • Amico 1741 269 no.13 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002186
  • Ferrara 1829 371 nο. 2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002005
  • Kirchhoff 1877 9485 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001249
  • Kaibel 1890 551 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • Ferrua 1938 69 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002004
  • Ferrua 1989 117 no.445 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
  • Korhonen 2004 200 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000028
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
